author: SegmentLinking
body:
With the introduction in CMSSW of alpaka functions for the computation of -related variables in #47033 and the related updates in #47154, these functions can be removed for the LST code and their centrally implemented equivalents can be used.

The code has been tested locally: it compiles and gives the identical results  (on CPU) for LST.
title: Use central phi functions instead LST ones
